structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.text: It is unlawful for any person as defined in KRS 223.400, to construct, alter, or repair a water well without first having obtained a valid certificate as provided for in KRS 223.425.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 212, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 215, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984.
